thread.title: Oscar Nominee 'Tanna' Puts Spotlight on South Pacific Tribe - MarketWatch
thread.title_full: Oscar Nominee 'Tanna' Puts Spotlight on South Pacific Tribe - MarketWatch

title: Oscar Nominee 'Tanna' Puts Spotlight on South Pacific Tribe - MarketWatch
text:
Oscar Nominee 'Tanna' Puts Spotlight on South Pacific Tribe By Share Members of a tiny South Pacific tribe from Vanuatu, who had never even seen a movie before acting in the Oscar-nominated "Tanna," are preparing to attend the Academy Awards in Hollywood. Co-director Bentley Dean spoke with the WSJ's Paolo Bosonin. Photo: Contact Back to Top
